oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Words in the Katkop dialect, from #kasin (B XXV. 2355-2360), from !kweiten ta //ken (L VI.-1. 3882, 3859-3897), and from Dia!kwain (L V.-6. 4434 and 4435, 8. 4615 rev., 9. 4653 rev., etc.). A list of |xam names for parts of the body, including the 'great throat artery', head and neck bones, and sinews. 1) This story is found in Book V-6.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lucy Lloyd |xam notebooks
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Words and sentences: parts of the body
